Package com.w2.api.engine.components.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BodyLinearAngular
    BodyLinearAngular objects instruct a Robot how to position its body in terms of linear and angular velocity, assuming that the center point is the center point of the robot.
    BodyWheels
    BodyWheels objects instruct a Robot how to move by specifying the velocity for each wheel.
    EyeRing
    `EyeRing` object instruct a `Robot` how to display its eye pattern.
    HeadBang
    HeadBang objects instruct a Robot to perform a decisive head bang motion.
    HeadPosition
    The HeadPosition objects sets the Robot head position horizontally or vertically.
    LightMono
    The LightMono object instructs a Robot how to set the brightness of a light.
    LightRGB
    The LightRGB object instructs a Robot how to set the RGB values of its light.
    Speaker
    Instructs a Robot object what sound file to play, if it exists.
    The command is a no-op if the sound file does not exist on the robot.
